title: Elderly Fall Prevention: Evidence-Based Practice and Blended Methodology Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary medical knowledge and professional work experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones, including team-based learning and practical assessments.

learning_goals: Participants will be able to analyze real-world cases using fall risk assessment tools for the elderly.
Participants will be able to design fall prevention strategies applying evidence-based practice (EBP) approaches.
Participants will be able to analyze educational program effectiveness through mixed-methods (quantitative/qualitative) evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
